QuestData.Title: Requisition a Riverbeast
QuestData.Description: I wasn't sure about this next beast, but it turns out that they've got a key strategic purpose. The riverbeast is quite at home in the water!$B$BYou'll find the best ones around in Talador, around about Duskfall Island. Look for the huge, floating lumps out in the water.$B$BTry not to get wet!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Riverbeast Lasso on a Young Riverwallow and follow it until it is tamed.
